kpi.name: MGW_994a

kpi_info.title: Received octets on the M3UA association
kpi_info.use: The number of octets received on the M3UA association. This counter calculates the number of bytes received in M3UA messages. It consists of all the M3UA messages including M3UA header and M3UA payload.

kpi.kpi_alias: Received octets on the M3UA association
